section.heading: Disclosure of information by the Council.
section.text: The Council shall not withhold information from the public regarding its operations, procedures, and decisions that would otherwise be subject to disclosure under subchapter II of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction by substituting “Council” for “Board”.
